label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_006
content:
## 2024-04-08 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 106
- Active: 105
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 10
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 1

### Enrollment By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 27
- Mid Dose: 26
- High Dose: 28
- Placebo: 25

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 35.4
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 20.3
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 71.9
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 92.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 62.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 17.9
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 64.4
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 32.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 104.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 156.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 105.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 26.5
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 93.0
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 41.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 141.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 212.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 151.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 31.8
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 11.3
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 4.9
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 16.7
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 12.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 19.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 3.6

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 61.8
- Erythema Percentage: 13.9
- Swelling Percentage: 16.7
- Induration Percentage: 6.4
- Mean Pain Duration (hours): 19.6

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 21.2
- Fatigue Percentage: 42.9
- Myalgia Percentage: 31.4
- Headache Percentage: 18.9
- Chills Percentage: 5.7

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 5.5
- WBC (K) SD: 1.7
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 37.5
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 4.7
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 57.9
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 7.9
- Platelets (K) Mean: 220
- Platelets (K) SD: 40
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 7.5
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 0.6
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.7
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.3

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-0627, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0632, Description: lymphadenopathy, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0610, Description: arthralgia, Grade: 2, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose

### Events
- Serology samples shipped to central immunology lab
- DSMB safety review teleconference completed
- Serum sample aliquoting completed for 15 subjects

### Notes
- Week 6: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 106 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
